meaningMnemonic: People made from <kanji>simple</kanji> <kanji>element</kanji>s are also pretty <vocabulary>simple</vocabulary>. And they can be <vocabulary>naive</vocabulary> too. But that's just how they're built.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
